venue.name: Peter's Park - Joe Wex Dog Run

item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a VERY SPECIAL meetup at Peter's Park!

On Saturday the 30th bring your frenchie dressed in their favorite costume to celebrate Halloween! Clyde is making delicious pumpkin eyeball pupcakes and bringing some bat's blood punch for all of his four-legged friends. Creepy! Feel free to dress up yourself, I'll be in costume too!

NUTRO is sponsoring our group thru November 2nd, so meetup dues are on them!

And we've got a bunch of delicious dog food samples from The Honest Kitchen for spooky party favors! Hooray for healthy and generous frenchie loving companies.

Side note...the South End's Divas Unleashed Halloween Dog Parade is NOT happening this year, I did call to confirm.

Can't wait to see you there! Letitia & Clyde

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: BARKtober French Bulldog Meetup - HAPPY HALLOWEEN!
